Summary: multicolored star that is moving around up and down sideways
divs: Sighting DetailsI have been going out in my back yard and a star that is multicolored is in the sky in the east and when I watch it it appears to move up and down and back and forth in the sky, I watched it several nights and it is moving around and I look at other stars to make sure it is not my eyes but this things is moving around! I went to you tube and others are reporting a multi colored star, I wish I had someone to come here and tell me what this is, it has been there every night I go out with my dog!
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Montrose
There were no other sightings in Montrose on or around October 28th 1948
